eu.gricom.interpreter.basic.helper

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.gricom.interpreter.basic.helper.Logger

  • public class Logger
extends Object
    Logger.java

    Description:

    Light weight logger object as part of the infrastructure. This logger works similar to the log4j logger, but does provide less overhead.

    (c) = 2004,..,2016 by Andreas Grimm, Den Haag, The Netherlands

    Created in 2003

    • Method Detail

      • setFileName

        public final void setFileName(String strLogFileBaseName)
        Sets the log file name and opens an empty log file.
        Parameters:
        strLogFileBaseName - - name of the log file

      • endLogger

        public final void endLogger()
        Terminates the use of the logger. Closes the log files and resets the log file name.

      • trace

        public final void trace(String strMessage)
        Stores trace message. The message is either stored locally (_bUseLog4J is false) or is using the Log4J package
        Parameters:
        strMessage - - content of the message

      • debug

        Stores debug message. The message is either stored locally (_bUseLog4J is false) or is using the Log4J package
        Parameters:

        Parameters:

      • swapLogFile

        public final boolean swapLogFile(String strFileName)
        Changes the name of the log file.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        - true, if change successful

      • setLogLevel

        public final void setLogLevel(String strLogLevel)
        Sets the Log Level.
        Parameters:
